name: Lollipop Collective
description: Lollipop Collective is known for organizing the most vibrant and eclectic techno events in the city.

name: Fuse Collective
description: Fuse Collective brings together the best of techno music with unforgettable club nights.

name: C12 Collective
description: C12 Collective offers a unique experience with underground techno events in a hidden gem of a venue.

name: Voltage Collective
description: Voltage Collective electrifies the techno scene with high-energy events and top-notch artists.

name: Underwater Collective
description: Underwater Collective immerses you in a deep techno experience with their unique themed parties.

name: Underground Collective
description: Underground Collective is dedicated to bringing you the raw and unfiltered sounds of the techno underground.

name: Beach Vibes Collective
description: Beach Vibes Collective combines sun, sand, and techno for an unforgettable beachside party experience.
